title: Cobell Graduate Scholarship
full_description: The Cobell Graduate Scholarship is available to American Indian and Alaska Native graduate students pursuing advanced degrees. This scholarship supports graduate-level education including master's and doctoral programs.
short_description: Graduate scholarship for advanced degree pursuit
eligibility: Must be enrolled as a full-time graduate student; Must have a minimum 3.0 GPA; Must be an enrolled member of a federally recognized tribe; Must be pursuing a graduate degree at an accredited institution
